author: christine_dkim
content: ^ small request for the people who manage the zoom meetings for the acd calls, would it be possible to make the live transcripts of the calls copyable? i write summaries of the calls in real time so having the option to directly pull a quote from the live transcript would be super useful! not sure tbh if this is even possible but throwing it out there in case it's a feature that can be turned on for the calls!

author: greystroke
content:
Two live transcription tools are:
https://maestra.ai (free)
https://otter.ai (paid $10/mo, natively integrates with teams, zoom & Google meet)

author: christine_dkim
content: thanks! there's definitely non zoom tools out there, some minor benefits of using the in app tool is the automatic speaker to quote references, but yeah no biggie if it's not possible, i just noticed that more zoom features like the transcript and ai summaries were being turned on for the calls so wanted to throw out there this would be another add on that's useful!
